articles.author: By Amina Niasse
articles.title: New US COVID guidelines add confusion, complications for Americans seeking shots - Yahoo
articles.description: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Americans headed to pharmacies for COVID-19 vaccines are running into roadblocks and confusion due to new U.S. guidance that abandoned...
articles.content:
By Amina Niasse
NEW YORK (Reuters) -Americans headed to pharmacies for COVID-19 vaccines are running into roadblocks and confusion due to new U.S. guidance that abandoned broad support for the shots… [+5670 chars]
